deleteConfirmation.text: Are you sure you want delete this thing?

haveNoAccess.message: You are not authorized to view this page, ask broadcaster to provide it.

validations.startsWith: Command name should not start with !
validations.len: Command name should be less than 25 characters

responses.label: Responses

validations.empty: Response should not be empty. Command can be created without responses, so you can omit this field.
validations.len: Response should be less than 500 characters

responses.defaultWarning: Responses cannot be edited for default commands

permissions.name: Roles
permissions.placeholder: Select roles, which will have permissions to use commands
permissions.deniedUsers: Users, who cannot use that command
permissions.allowedUsers: Users, who can bypass roles restriction for that command

restrictions.name: Restrictions by stats
restrictions.watchTime: Required watch time for use that command
restrictions.messages: Required messages for use that command
restrictions.channelsPoints: Required used channels points for use that command

reply.label: Reply
reply.text: Bot will send commands responses as reply

visible.label: Visibility
visible.text: Command visibility in public page, in commands list variable.

keepOrder.label: Keep order of responses
keepOrder.text: Bot will keep your order of respones when they sent in chat

onlineOnly.label: Online only
onlineOnly.text: Command will work only when stream online

botManage.title: Bot manage
botManage.notModerator: We have found that the bot is not a moderator on this channel. Please, use /mod {botName}, or some of functionality may work incorrectly.

obs.warningTitle: You have to configure obs first
obs.warningText: Seems like you not connected Twir with obs, please do it on overlays page.
